data.name: ACTIVE_ITEM_DELETED
data.value: メディアファイルが削除されています
data.comment: Warning displayed as notification when user deletes the media item that is currently being shown.

data.name: ALLOW_DB_ACCESS
data.value: OnlyMのデータベースにアクセスできません。
data.comment: Error message that is displayed at startup if OnlyM cannot access its database folder (e.g. if Windows controlled folder access is enabled)

data.name: ALLOW_MIRROR
data.value: ミラーリング用ウィンドウを許可する
data.comment: See Settings => Web

data.name: ALLOW_PAUSE
data.value: 一時停止を許可する
data.comment: See Settings => Videos and Audio. Allow the media to be paused.

data.name: ALLOW_SCRUB
data.value: 一時停止中、再生位置変更時のフレーム表示を許可する
data.comment: See Settings => Videos and Audio. Enable "scrubbing" - moving back and forward in the media to locate a section.

data.name: ALLOW_SEEK
data.value: 再生位置の変更を許可する
data.comment: See Settings => Videos and Audio. Allow the media play position to be set manually

data.name: APP_VER
data.value: OnlyMのソフトウェアバージョン: {0}
data.comment: See Settings => Images. Please retain the "{0}" - it's a placeholder for the version number

data.name: AUTO_ROTATE
data.value: 自動回転
data.comment: See Settings => Images. Automatically rotate images (typically photos) that have been taken with the camera rotated sideways.

data.name: BLANK_SCREEN
data.value: 無地スクリーン
data.comment: Title of the "Blank Screen" item

data.name: CACHE_IMAGES
data.value: 画像をキャッシュする（パフォーマンスが向上しますがメモリが必要です）
data.comment: See Settings => Images.

data.name: CANNOT_DELETE_FILE
data.value: ファイルを削除できません
data.comment: Displayed in notification bar when a media item caanot be deleted.

data.name: CHANGE_MIRROR_HOTKEY
data.value: ミラーリング終了のホットキーを変更してください。
data.comment: Warning displaed in the notification bar if the mirror window hotkey is in use by another application.

data.name: CLEAR_RECENTS
data.value: クリア
data.comment: Command label at the bottom of the recent times list in the start offset dialog

data.name: CONFIRM_STOP
data.value: 停止時に確認する
data.comment: See Settings => Videos and Audio.

data.name: CONFIRM_STOP_MEDIA
data.value: 再生を停止しますか？
data.comment: Prompt that is displayed when you attempt to stop playback

data.name: CONTAINS_1_ROLLING_SLIDE
data.value: (1枚のループスライドが含まれています)
data.comment: Used in slideshow media items to show the number of "rolling" slide, i.e. slides that are automatically played one after another

data.name: CONTAINS_1_SLIDE
data.value: (1枚のスライドが含まれています)
data.comment: Used in slideshow media items to show the number of slides in the slidehow.

data.name: CONTAINS_X_ROLLING_SLIDES
data.value: ({0}枚の自動切替スライドが含まれています)
data.comment: Used in slideshow media items to show the number of "rolling" slide, i.e. slides that are automatically played one after another

data.name: CONTAINS_X_SLIDES
data.value: ({0}枚のスライドが含まれています)
data.comment: Used in slideshow media items to show the number of slides in the slidehow.

data.name: COPYING_ERROR
data.value: エラーが発生しました
data.comment: Message displayed when there is an error copying media to the OnlyM media folder

data.name: CURRENT_DATE
data.value: 現在の日付
data.comment: See Settings => Miscellaneous

data.name: DELETE
data.value: 削除
data.comment: Button label in Command panel

data.name: DISPLAY_HELP
data.value: ヘルプを表示する
data.comment: Tooltip for the Help button in the main window

data.name: DLG_CANCEL
data.value: キャンセル
data.comment: Button caption in dialog used to specify media start offset

data.name: DLG_OK
data.value: OK
data.comment: Button caption in dialog used to specify media start offset

data.name: DROP_HERE
data.value: ここにメディアファイルをドロップしてください
data.comment: Text displayed in the "drop zone" - the dotted area where you drag and drop media files to.

data.name: FADING_SPEED
data.value: 切り替え速度
data.comment: See Settings => Images

data.name: FADING_STYLE
data.value: 切り替え方法
data.comment: See Settings => Images

data.name: FILES_COPIED
data.value: {0}個のファイルをコピーしました
data.comment: Displayed as a notification message when several files are dropped onto the media list. Please leve the placeholder as it is.

data.name: FILE_COPIED
data.value: ファイルをコピーしました
data.comment: Displayed as a notification message when a single file is dropped onto the media list.

data.name: FOLDER
data.value: メディアフォルダーを開く
data.comment: Tooltip on the main page Folder button

data.name: FOLDER_DISABLED
data.value: 管理者によってメディアフォルダーが無効にされています。
data.comment: If the Folder button is disabled then this is the tooltip for the Main page Folder button

data.name: FREEZE
data.value: 再生後に停止
data.comment: Button label in Command panel. Freeze the video on the final frame.

data.name: GENERATING_SUBTITLES
data.value: 字幕を生成しています
data.comment: Displayed in the notification bar when a subtitle file is generated for a video.

data.name: HIDE
data.value: 非表示
data.comment: Button label in Command panel. Hide the media item.

data.name: HOURS
data.value: 時
data.comment: Column title in media start offset dialog (number of hours)

data.name: IMAGE_MARGINS
data.value: 画像の余白
data.comment: See Settings => Margins

data.name: INCLUDE_BLANK
data.value: 「無地スクリーン」の項目を含める
data.comment: See Settings => Display. Includes a blank image at the top of the list of media items.

data.name: JWL_TRADEMARK
data.value: JW Library は Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania の登録商標です
data.comment: See Settings => Main

data.name: JW_COMPAT_MODE
data.value: JW Library 互換モード
data.comment: See Settings => Display. Enables JW Library compatibility mode

data.name: LANGUAGE
data.value: 言語
data.comment: See Settings => Miscellaneous

data.name: LAUNCHING_MIRROR
data.value: ミラーリングを開始しています...
data.comment: Displayed when mirror window is launching

data.name: LOADING_FRAME
data.value: フレーム{0}を読み込んでいます
data.comment: Progress message displayed when loading a web page

data.name: LOGGING_LEVEL
data.value: ログレベル
data.comment: See Settings => Miscellaneous.

data.name: LOGGING_LEVEL_HIGH
data.value: ログレベルが高く設定されています
data.comment: Warning shown in notification bar if logging level is set to Debug or Verbose

data.name: MAX_ITEMS
data.value: メディア項目の最大数
data.comment: See Settings => Media Files

data.name: MEDIA_ACTIVE
data.value: メディアを表示中です。閉じることができません。
data.comment: This is the notification displayed if you try to close OnlyM when media is playing.

data.name: MEDIA_FOLDER
data.value: メディアフォルダー
data.comment: See Settings => Media Files

data.name: MEDIA_FOLDER_BROWSE
data.value: メディアフォルダーの選択
data.comment: Title of the "Open Folder" dialog that is displayed when you click the folder button in Settings => Media Files

data.name: MEDIA_FOLDER_CMDLINE
data.value: コマンドラインで指定されているメディアフォルダー
data.comment: Displayed in Settings => Media Files when the media folder is set using a command-line option.

data.name: MEDIA_MONITOR
data.value: モニター
data.comment: See Settings => Display

data.name: MEDIA_PAGE
data.value: メディアページ
data.comment: Tooltip for the Settings page "Back" button

data.name: MEDIA_WINDOWED
data.value: ウィンドウ表示モード
data.comment: See Settings => Display

data.name: MEDIA_WINDOWED_ON_TOP
data.value: 常に手前に表示（ウィンドウ表示モード）
data.comment: Option in Settings => Display

data.name: MINUTES
data.value: 分
data.comment: Column title in media start offset dialog (number of minutes)

data.name: MIRROR
data.value: ミラーリング
data.comment: Checkbox caption in web and PDF media item

data.name: MIRROR_BY_DEFAULT
data.value: ミラーリングをデフォルトで有効にする
data.comment: See Settings => Web

data.name: MIRROR_HOTKEY
data.value: ミラーリング終了のホットキー
data.comment: See Settings => Web

data.name: MIRROR_ZOOM
data.value: ミラーリングの拡大
data.comment: See Settings => Web

data.name: MONITOR_NONE
data.value: なし
data.comment: Default (blank) menu item in Settings => Display => Media monitor

data.name: NEW_UPDATE_AVAILABLE
data.value: 新しい更新版が利用可能です
data.comment: Notification text displayed when there is a new version to download (can be translated the same as NEW_VERSION)

data.name: NEW_VERSION
data.value: 新しいバージョンが利用可能です
data.comment: Tooltip for the download button when a new version is ready (can be translated the same as NEW_UPDATE_AVAILABLE)

data.name: NO_DESELECT_MONITOR
data.value: メディアを表示中はモニターを選択解除できません
data.comment: Notification message displayed if you try to change the media monitor to "None" while media is being displayed. Try to keep this text short!

data.name: NO_DESELECT_WINDOWED
data.value: メディアを表示中はウィンドウ表示モードを解除できません
data.comment: Notification message displayed if you try to uncheck the windowed mode while media is being displayed and there is no chosen monitor. Try to keep this text short!

data.name: NO_SUPPORTED_FILES
data.value: サポートされているメディアファイルではありません
data.comment: Notification displayed if you drag and drop a file (or files) of a type that is not supported.

data.name: OK
data.value: OK

data.name: ON_TOP
data.value: メインウィンドウを常に手間に表示する
data.comment: See Settings => Miscellaneous

data.name: PAUSE_FINAL_FRAME
data.value: 最後のフレームで一時停止します
data.comment: Tooltip on Freeze button in Command panel

data.name: PDF_PAGENUM
data.value: 開始ページ
data.comment: See PDF media item command panel. This is the title for the textbox that is used to enter the PDF page number that is shown when it is first opened.

data.name: PDF_VIEW
data.value: 表示
data.comment: Caption for the combobox in the PDF command panel. The combo allows you to select the default "view" when the PDF is displayed, e.g. "Horizontal Fit"

data.name: PDF_VIEW_STYLE_DEFAULT
data.value: デフォルト
data.comment: See command panel of PDF media type. This is one of the items in the "View style" combo.

data.name: PDF_VIEW_STYLE_HORZ
data.value: 横幅に合わせる
data.comment: See command panel of PDF media type. This is one of the items in the "View style" combo.

data.name: PDF_VIEW_STYLE_VERT
data.value: 縦幅に合わせる
data.comment: See command panel of PDF media type. This is one of the items in the "View style" combo.

data.name: PERMANENT_BACKDROP
data.value: 常に無地の背景を表示する
data.comment: See Settings => Display.

data.name: PURGE_THUMBS
data.value: サムネイルのキャッシュをクリア
data.comment: See Settings => Media Files

data.name: PURGE_WEB_CACHE
data.value: ブラウザーのキャッシュをクリア
data.comment: See Settings => Web

data.name: PURGE_WEB_CACHE_RESTART
data.value: 次の再起動の時にブラウザのキャッシュがクリアされます。
data.comment: See Settings => Web

data.name: RECENT_TIMES
data.value: 最近の設定
data.comment: Combobox label in Start Offset Times dialog

data.name: RENDERING_ENGINE
data.value: レンダリングエンジン
data.comment: See Settings => Videos & Audio

data.name: RESTART_LANGUAGE
data.value: 言語を変更した後には OnlyM を再起動してください。
data.comment: See Settings => Miscellaneous

data.name: ROLLING_SLIDE_X_OF_Y
data.value: 自動切替スライドの{1}枚中{0}枚目
data.comment: Displayed when an automatic slideshow is being played. Please retain the placeholders.

data.name: SECONDS
data.value: 秒
data.comment: Column title in media start offset dialog (number of seconds)

data.name: SECTION_DISPLAY
data.value: ディスプレイ
data.comment: Section title for Settings => Display

data.name: SECTION_IMAGES
data.value: 画像
data.comment: Section title for Settings => Images

data.name: SECTION_MARGINS
data.value: 余白（スクリーンのサイズに対する比率）
data.comment: Section title for Settings => Margins

data.name: SECTION_MEDIA_FILES
data.value: メディアファイル
data.comment: Section title for Settings => Media Files

data.name: SECTION_MISC
data.value: その他
data.comment: Section title for Settings => Micellanesous

data.name: SECTION_VIDEO_AUDIO
data.value: ビデオ＆オーディオ
data.comment: Section title for Settings => Videos & Audio

data.name: SECTION_WEB
data.value: Web
data.comment: Section title for Settings => Web

data.name: SETTINGS
data.value: 設定
data.comment: Tooltip for the main page, Settings button

data.name: SETTINGS_DISABLED
data.value: 管理者によって設定が無効にされています。
data.comment: Tooltip for the main page, Settings button when it has been disabled by command-line option.

data.name: SET_MEDIA_START
data.value: メディアの再生開始位置
data.comment: Caption of dialog used to specify start offset for media

data.name: SHOW_FREEZE
data.value: コマンドパネルに「再生後に停止」オプションを表示する
data.comment: See Settings => Videos & Audio

data.name: SHOW_START_OFFSET_DLG
data.value: 再生開始位置を調整します
data.comment: Tooltip for the button that allows you to adjust media start time

data.name: SHOW_SUBTITLES
data.value: 利用可能な場合には字幕を表示する
data.comment: See Settings => Videos & Audio

data.name: SLIDE_X_OF_Y
data.value: スライドの{1}枚中{0}枚目
data.comment: Displayed when showing a slideshow to indicate which slide is being viewed. Please retain the placeholders.

data.name: UNHIDE
data.value: 再表示
data.comment: If you have hidden any of the media items (using the command panel), an "Unhide" button is displayed on the main page. This is the button caption.

data.name: USE_CMD_PANEL
data.value: コマンドパネルを有効にする
data.comment: See Settings => Media Files

data.name: USE_THUMBS
data.value: サムネイル情報が含まれている場合には使用する
data.comment: See Settings => Media Files

data.name: USE_TITLES
data.value: タイトル情報が含まれている場合には使用する
data.comment: See Settings => Media Files

data.name: VIDEO_MARGINS
data.value: ビデオの余白
data.comment: See Settings => Margins

data.name: VIEW
data.value: 表示
data.comment: The Notification bar sometimes displays a button to allow you to view further details. This is teh button caption. Please keep it short.

data.name: WEB_LOADING
data.value: 読み込んでいます...
data.comment: Displayed when a web page is loading

data.name: WEB_LOAD_FAIL
data.value: URLを読み込めませんでした。URL: {0} , エラー内容: {1} ({2})
data.comment: Error message displayed when a web page cannot be loaded.

data.name: WEB_MAGNIFIER_FRAME_THICKNESS
data.value: 拡大鏡の枠の太さ
data.comment: See Settings => Web

data.name: WEB_MAGNIFIER_SHAPE
data.value: 拡大鏡の形
data.comment: See Settings => Web

data.name: WEB_MAGNIFIER_SHOW
data.value: 拡大鏡を表示する
data.comment: See Settings => Web

data.name: WEB_MAGNIFIER_SIZE
data.value: 拡大鏡のサイズ
data.comment: See Settings => Web

data.name: WEB_MAGNIFIER_ZOOM
data.value: 拡大鏡の拡大率
data.comment: See Settings => Web

data.name: WEB_MARGINS
data.value: Webの余白
data.comment: See Settings => Margins

data.name: WEB_ZOOM_INCREMENT
data.value: ページの拡大/縮小ボタンの拡大率
data.comment: See Settings => Web

data.name: WILL_PAUSE
data.value: 最後のフレームで一時停止します
data.comment: Tooltip on thumbnail right margin when "Freeze" is enabled.

data.name: YES
data.value: はい
data.comment: Caption of the notification bar button to confirm that media should be stopped.
